DBsheetConfig.query: SELECT Id+':'+TradeType+','+isnull(EnvelopeNettingSetId,'') TradeId, T1.GroupingId FROM ORE.dbo.PortfolioTradeGroupingIds T1 INNER JOIN ORE.dbo.PortfolioTrades T2 ON T1.TradeId = T2.Id ORDER BY 1 ASC, 2 ASC

field.name: *TradeId
field.lookup: SELECT Id+':'+TradeType+','+isnull(EnvelopeNettingSetId,'') TradeId,Id FROM ORE.dbo.PortfolioTrades ORDER BY Id
